LanguageData.VGE_MassLance.label: mass lance
LanguageData.VGE_MassLance.description: A mechanoid-mounted portable mass driver artillery. It fires dense slugs at incredible velocities, capable of destroying even heavily armored gravships.
LanguageData.VGE_MassLance.tools.0.label: ствол
LanguageData.VGE_RocketswarmPod.label: rocketswarm pod
LanguageData.VGE_RocketswarmPod.description: A mechanoid-mounted, minified, twin-linked rocketswarm launcher. It is very effective against large groups of weaker combatants, but less effective against small numbers of armored targets.
LanguageData.VGE_RocketswarmPod.tools.0.label: ствол
